lines.text: Maybe if he made... a really long <c=#FF6000>Portable Hole</c> in the air itself?
That way, the bullet would sort of slow down as it was traveling down the hole...
And they could get the sticker ready to catch it on the other end!
I, uh... I don't know. And I don't know if it can really stretch distance like that.
Actually- no, the <c=#FF6000>maximum depth is four meters,</c> so... even if it could, it'd be too short to slow a bullet.
